abstract: James Murdoch, Rupert Murdoch's son who is set to be named chief executive at 21st Century Fox, has taken interest in digital streaming and ad technologies, as well as board positions on digital media companies like Vice and TrueX; will be leading company with his brother Lachlan as co-executive chairman.
lead_paragraph: James Murdoch, in partnership with his brother, Lachlan Murdoch, will be responsible for steering 21st Century Fox through the digital disruption of the 21st century.

headline.main: Young Murdoch Views TV as ‘Real Killer App’ in a New Digital World
headline.print_headline: Young Murdoch Views TV as ‘Real Killer App’ in a New Digital World

snippet: James Murdoch, in partnership with his brother, Lachlan Murdoch, will be responsible for steering 21st Century Fox through the digital disruption of the 21st century.
